articles.title: SOXL vs. QLD: Two Ways to Leverage Tech, With Very Different Stakes
articles.mainIdea: SOXL vs. QLD: Two Ways to Leverage Tech, With Very Different Stakes
articles.summary: Motley Fool: SOXL vs. QLD: Two Ways to Leverage Tech, With Very Different Stakes. Both ETFs amplify technology gains, yet QLD leans on broad growth leadership while SOXL turns semiconductor cycles and daily leverage resets into the defining driver of returns Related tickers mentioned: SOXL.

articles.title: Why Bloom Energy (BE) Stock Is Up Today
articles.mainIdea: Why Bloom Energy (BE) Stock Is Up Today
articles.summary: StockStory: Why Bloom Energy (BE) Stock Is Up Today. Shares of electricity generation and hydrogen production company Bloom Energy (NYSE:BE) jumped 3% in the afternoon session after the stock benefited from a broader market rally and growing investor interest in companies powering the expansion of artificial intelligence (AI). Related tickers mentioned: BE.
